data.title: John Lynch (TV Actor) - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: John Lynch (TV Actor): his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Actor and novelist known for his debut roles in films focused on the political unrest, known as The Troubles, in Northern Ireland during the 1980s when he was just beginning his career as an actor.

Before Fame

He attended St. Colman's College. He started his career acting in Irish language plays.

Trivia

He has written two books published under a HarperCollins imprint.

Family Life

His sister Susan Lynch and nephew Thomas Finnegan are both actors. He divorced his first wife, fellow actor Mary McGuckian, and now lives in France with his partner Christine.

Associated With
